name: Submersible Nuclear Rainbow
text:
7 "Submersible" monsters
Must be Fusion Summoned with the above Fusion Material Monsters and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. You can banish this face-up card you control; shuffle all monsters your opponent controls into the Deck. If this card leaves the field because of its own effect, you can add up to 3 "Submersible" monsters from your Deck to your hand. You can only Special Summon 1 "Submersible Rainbow" per turn.
